EmailTemplate.name: 201904_ChannelPartnerSurvey_kcr.201904_ChannelPartnerSurvey_kcr
EmailTemplate.subject: Channel Partner: Honeywell wants to hear from you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> HONEYWELL AEROSPACE | CHANNEL PARTNERS YOUR OPINION MATTERS. Tell us how we're doing! Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Partner}},
Thank you for being a Honeywell Channel Partner. Over the last two years, Honeywell's Channel Partner program has undergone a number of changes. We would appreciate it if you could take a few minutes to share your thoughts and feedback via a brief, anonymous survey by Tuesday, April 16, 2019.
TAKE OUR SURVEY! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/S36ZWK9]]>
The survey is intended for individuals familiar with the channel partner relationship. If you are receiving this email and are not involved in the management of the channel partner program with Honeywell, please disregard or forward to the appropriate person within your organization.
Information collected from the survey will be used internally to continue to improve the Channel Partner program, and better enable your operational success.
Thank you for your candid feedback.
Carrie Kendrick VP General Manager, Aerospace Aftermarket Services
